item.title: Another Hugo Post, but using JSON
item.description: The wait is over, UFC 229 in Las Vegas comes packed with some massive clashes. This is our betting guide to the main events at UFC 229.

item.title: Top 5 betting strategies for the NBA
item.description: Having a strategy and following it are the first lessons on a successful bettor’s playbook. In this article we explore the best betting strategies for basketball, and how to use them in the sport’s most important tournament: the NBA.

item.description: To find out, Cloudbet commissioned a research project in 17 countries around the world. Over 7,000 interviews later, here is what the data says.
